definition: to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: I've been talked down to by my own child.
sentences.chinese: 我被自己的小孩抢白了一番。

sentences.english: Product such as home to seek a eal to hong QiangBai product such as meal, baifeng turned into the bedroom.
